title: Software Engineer
work: Developed a ReactJS based enrolment platform incorporating a key feature of dynamic form development with JSON-driven specifications leading to 80% reduction in time and efforts for developing new forms.

Created rigorous Jest test cases for API testing, ensuring robust functionality and reliable API performance.
Crafted a solid design system to enforce consistency across the application and enhance the overall user interface.

title: Independent React Developer

title: Independent React Developer
